Articles.Content:
a few months back i was messing around with a craft in orbit of vall, when all of the sudden the whole moon turned purple. i thought it was a bug but then i realized that jools horizon has a purple sunrise/sunset. jool was changing the light color to purple! i looked this up on the forums but didnt find anything related to it.

not sure if this was an addon feature but it seems like a pretty rare phenomenon judging by the fact that ive only ever seen this once
Moved to KSP discussion as it's about the game and not real life spaceflight.
Do you have the mod Scatterer? Sounds a lot like Scatterer. Also, it's a solar eclipse
